frame.name: Cooking_creation
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes food and meal preparation. A <fen>Cook</fen> creates a <fen>Produced_food</fen> from (raw) <fen>Ingredients</fen>. The <fen>Heating_Instrument</fen> and/or the <fen>Container</fen> may also be specified.
<ex><fex name="Cook">Caitlin</fex> <t>baked</t> <fex name="Food">some cookies</fex> <fex name="Ingredients">from the pre-packaged dough</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Cook
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cook</fen> prepares the <fen>Produced_food</fen>. <ex><fex name="Cook">Drew</fex> <t>cooked</t> dinner for his friends.</ex> <ex><fex name="Cook">Drew</fex> <t>baked</t> an apple pie.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Produced_food
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Produced_food</fen> is the result of a <fen>Cook</fen>'s efforts. <ex>Drew <t>prepared</t> <fex name="Food">dinner</fex> for his friends.</ex> <ex>Drew <t>baked</t> <fex name="Food">an apple pie</fex> for dessert.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Heating_instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Heating_Instrument</fen> with which the <fen>Cook</fen> prepares the <fen>Food</fen>. <ex>Drew <t>prepared</t> vegetable soup <fex name="Heat_instr">in a crock pot</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Container
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifes the <fen>Container</fen> that holds the food being produced. <ex><t>Bake</t> the quiche <fex name="Container">in a pie tin</fex>.</ex> Things that apply the heat directly are <fen>Heating_Instrument</fen>s, e.g. <ment>crock-pot</ment>, <ment>electric griddle</ment>. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the cooking creation occurs.
<ex>Drew <t>prepared</t> the soup <fex name="Place"> in the kitchen</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the cooking creation is performed. <ex>Drew <t>prepared</t> the soup <fex name="Means"> by throwing some vegetables into a pot of water</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the cooking creation is performed.
<ex>Drew <t>baked</t> an apple pie <fex name="Purp">to show Patty he was sorry</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Recipient
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Recipient</fen> identifies the person for whom the food has been prepared.
<ex>Drew <t>baked</t> an apple pie <fex name="Rec">for Patty.</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the cooking creation occurs. <ex>Drew <t>baked</t> an apple pie <fex name="Time">at six int he morning</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the cooking creation performed.
<ex>Drew <t>prepared</t> dinner <fex name="Manner">hastily</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Ingredients
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Ingredients</fen> which are altered by the <fen>Cook</fen> to create the <fen>Produced_food</fen>. <ex>Drew <t>baked</t> a pie <fex name="Ingr">with apples, nuts, and raisins.</fex></ex> </def-root>

lexUnit.name: concoct.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make a dish or meal by combining ingredients

lexUnit.name: whip up.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make or prepare something, especially food, very quickly

lexUnit.name: cook.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: prepare food by mixing, combining, and heating the ingredients.

lexUnit.name: prepare.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make food ready for cooking or eating

lexUnit.name: make.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: produce a meal or a component of a meal

lexUnit.name: bake.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cook food by dry heat without direct exposure to a flame, typically in an oven

lexUnit.name: put together.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: make food by mixing ingredients; mix ingredients

lexUnit.name: cook.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person who has cooked (a particular meal) or who cooks (in general).

lexUnit.name: preparation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act or process of making food ready for cooking and/or eating

lexUnit.name: baking.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of cooking food by dry heat, typically in an oven

lexUnit.name: cooking.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of preparing food through the use of heat

lexUnit.name: grill.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cook by direct heat, as on/under a grill or over a hot fire

lexUnit.name: grilling.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of cooking by direct heat, as on/under a grill or over a hot fire

lexUnit.name: roast.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cook by prolonged exposure to heat in an oven or over a fire

lexUnit.name: roasting.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of cooking by prolonged exposure to heat in an oven or over a fire

lexUnit.name: fry.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cook or be cooked in hot fat or oil

lexUnit.name: frying.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of cooking in hot fat or oil

lexUnit.name: fix.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: produce a meal or part of a meal
